name: The Kryntonian Menace
description:
Set in the far distant future, you are a lone survivor on your ship as three Kryntonian Dead Spiders have managed to get aboard. Will you survive? Will you make it through?

This game was made in less than 48 hours for Miz Jam 1
47:52:12 exactly

-Devlog video coming soon before the end of the Miz Jam 1 rating period-

Livestream archives of the development:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1N9mF-npKvU&list=PL7WU5IMd2RCOfcNYhJHHLhYmrZFVdbDqm

Controls:

-WASD to move
-Mouse to look around
-Ctrl to crouch
-Space to jump
-E to grab items
-Tab for inventory
-Left Mouse Button to shoot (when you have a weapon)
-F to toggle flashlight (when you have a flashlight)
-C to toggle crosshair on/off
-R to restart (when dead)
-Backspace to quit
Most of the important controls get stated in game

Good luck and have fun!

In this final release one major bug is present: An out of bounds glitch easily performed by slamming in to the corners of the airlocks (can probably also be performed in different tight spots), sadly it is not something I could fix within the time I had left. Such are the limits of a game jam. I hope you'll be able to look past this issue and still enjoy the game for what it is, but because of this the following has been implemented as a 'fix' for the game jam so people won't get stuck out of bounds:

Debug control: 
-press ; to restart the game at any time. 

After the game jam is over I hope to be able to release a final bug fix patch
